com.bosch.iot.suite.example.octopussuite.description: Description: This IPSO object should be used with a humidity sensor to report a humidity measurement.  It also provides resources for minimum/maximum measured values and the minimum/maximum range that can be measured by the humidity sensor. An example measurement unit is relative humidity as a percentage (ucum:%).

statusProperties.name: sensorValue
statusProperties.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

statusProperties.name: minMeasuredValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

statusProperties.name: maxMeasuredValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

statusProperties.name: minRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

statusProperties.name: maxRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

statusProperties.name: sensorUnits
statusProperties.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. ?Cel? for Temperature in Celsius.

operations.name: resetMinandMaxMeasuredValues
operations.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

com.bosch.iot.suite.example.octopussuite.description: Description: This IPSO object should be used with a temperature sensor to report a temperature measurement.  It also provides resources for minimum/maximum measured values and the minimum/maximum range that can be measured by the temperature sensor. An example measurement unit is degrees Celsius (ucum:Cel).

statusProperties.name: sensorValue
statusProperties.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

statusProperties.name: minMeasuredValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

statusProperties.name: minRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

statusProperties.name: maxRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

statusProperties.name: sensorUnits
statusProperties.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. ?Cel? for Temperature in Celsius.

operations.name: resetMinandMaxMeasuredValues
operations.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

com.bosch.iot.suite.example.octopussuite.description: This IPSO object should be used with voltmeter sensor to report measured voltage between two points.  It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor. An example measurement unit is volts (ucum: V).

configurationProperties.name: currentCalibration
configurationProperties.description: Read or Write the current calibration coefficient

configurationProperties.name: applicationType
configurationProperties.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case

statusProperties.name: sensorValue
statusProperties.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

statusProperties.name: sensorUnits
statusProperties.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. ?Cel? for Temperature in Celsius

statusProperties.name: minMeasuredValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

statusProperties.name: maxMeasuredValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

statusProperties.name: minRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

statusProperties.name: maxRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

operations.name: resetMinandMaxMeasuredValues
operations.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

com.bosch.iot.suite.example.octopussuite.description: Model defining the fab-lab.eu Octopus - Bosch IoT Suite Edition

functionblocks.name: humidity
functionblocks.description: relative humidity provided by sensor BME680

functionblocks.name: pressure
functionblocks.description: barometric pressure provided by sensor BME680

functionblocks.name: gas_resistance
functionblocks.description: volatile organic compounds (VOC) provided by sensor BME680

functionblocks.name: linear_acceleration
functionblocks.description: linear acceleratrion provided by sensor BNO055

functionblocks.name: angular_velocity
functionblocks.description: angular velocity provided by sensor BNO055

functionblocks.name: gravity
functionblocks.description: gravitational forces provided by sensor BNO055

functionblocks.name: orientation
functionblocks.description: absolute orientation provided by sensor BNO055

functionblocks.name: magnetometer
functionblocks.description: magnetic field strength provided by sensor BNO055

com.bosch.iot.suite.example.octopussuite.description: Description: This IPSO object should be used with an air pressure sensor to report a barometer measurement.  It also provides resources for minimum/maximum measured values and the minimum/maximum range that can be measured by the barometer sensor. An example measurement unit is kPa (ucum:kPa).

statusProperties.name: sensorValue
statusProperties.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

statusProperties.name: minMeasuredValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

statusProperties.name: maxMeasuredValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

statusProperties.name: minRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

statusProperties.name: maxRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

statusProperties.name: sensorUnits
statusProperties.description: If present, the type of sensor defined as the UCUM Unit Definition e.g. ?Cel? for Temperature in Celcius.

operations.name: resetMinandMaxMeasuredValues
operations.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

com.bosch.iot.suite.example.octopussuite.description: This IPSO Object is used to report the current reading of a gyrometer sensor in 3 axes. It provides tracking of the minimum and maximum angular rate in all 3 axes. An example unit of measure is radians per second (ucum:rad/s).

configurationProperties.name: applicationType
configurationProperties.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

statusProperties.name: xValue
statusProperties.description: The measured value along the X axis.

statusProperties.name: yValue
statusProperties.description: The measured value along the Y axis.

statusProperties.name: zValue
statusProperties.description: The measured value along the Z axis.

statusProperties.name: sensorUnits
statusProperties.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. ?Cel? for Temperature in Celsius.

statusProperties.name: minXValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum measured value along the X axis

statusProperties.name: maxXValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum measured value along the X axis

statusProperties.name: minYValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum measured value along the Y axis

statusProperties.name: maxYValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum measured value along the Y axis

statusProperties.name: minZValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum measured value along the Z axis

statusProperties.name: maxZValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum measured value along the Z axis

statusProperties.name: minRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

statusProperties.name: maxRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

operations.name: resetMinandMaxMeasuredValues
operations.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value.

com.bosch.iot.suite.example.octopussuite.description: This IPSO object allow the description of a generic sensor. It is based on the description of a value and a unit according to the UCUM specification. Thus, any type of value defined within this specification can be reporting using this object. Specific object for a given range of sensors is described later in the document, enabling to identify the type of sensors directly from its Object ID. This object may be used as a generic object if a dedicated one does not exist.

configurationProperties.name: applicationType
configurationProperties.description: If present, the application type of the sensor as a string, for instance, ?CO2?

statusProperties.name: sensorValue
statusProperties.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

statusProperties.name: sensorUnits
statusProperties.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. ?Cel? for Temperature in Celsius.

statusProperties.name: minMeasuredValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

statusProperties.name: maxMeasuredValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

statusProperties.name: minRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

statusProperties.name: maxRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

statusProperties.name: sensorType
statusProperties.description: The type of the sensor (for instance PIR type)

operations.name: resetMinandMaxMeasuredValues
operations.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

com.bosch.iot.suite.example.octopussuite.description: Description: This IPSO object can be used to represent a 1-3 axis magnetometer with optional compass direction.

statusProperties.name: xValue
statusProperties.description: The measured value along the X axis.

statusProperties.name: yValue
statusProperties.description: The measured value along the Y axis.

statusProperties.name: zValue
statusProperties.description: The measured value along the Z axis.

statusProperties.name: compassDirection
statusProperties.description: The compass direction

statusProperties.name: sensorUnits
statusProperties.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. ?Cel? for Temperature in Celsius.

statusProperties.name: xValue

statusProperties.name: yValue

statusProperties.name: zValue

statusProperties.name: minRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

statusProperties.name: maxRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

com.bosch.iot.suite.example.octopussuite.description: This IPSO object should be used with an altitude sensor to report altitude above sea level in meters. Note that Altitude can be calculated from the measured pressure given the local sea level pressure.  It also provides resources for minimum and maximum measured values, as well as the minimum and maximum range that can be measured by the sensor. An example measurement unit is meters (ucum: m).

configurationProperties.name: currentCalibration
configurationProperties.description: Read or Write the current calibration coefficient

configurationProperties.name: applicationType
configurationProperties.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case

statusProperties.name: sensorValue
statusProperties.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor

statusProperties.name: sensorUnits
statusProperties.description: Measurement Units Definition e.g. ?Cel? for Temperature in Celsius

statusProperties.name: minMeasuredValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

statusProperties.name: maxMeasuredValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset

statusProperties.name: minRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

statusProperties.name: maxRangeValue
statusProperties.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

operations.name: resetMinandMaxMeasuredValues
operations.description: Reset the Min and Max Measured Values to Current Value

com.bosch.iot.suite.example.octopussuite.description: This IPSO object can be used to report the position of a shuttle or joystick control. A digital input is provided to report the state of an associated push button.

configurationProperties.name: applicationType
configurationProperties.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

statusProperties.name: digitalInputState
statusProperties.description: The current state of a digital input.

statusProperties.name: digitalInputCounter
statusProperties.description: The number of times the input transitions from 0 to 1.

statusProperties.name: xValue
statusProperties.description: The measured value along the X axis.

statusProperties.name: yValue
statusProperties.description: The measured value along the Y axis.

statusProperties.name: zValue
statusProperties.description: The measured value along the Z axis.
